Requirement: Immutable lineage, non-executable artifact, audit log snapshot
enforce_aln_persistenceAlignment: ENFORCE RULES.IMMUTABLE and ENABLE AUDIT.LOGGING enforce immutable records and real-time auditing, converting static history into a live compliance engine.

Requirement: Quarantine on violation, biometric anchor, quantum channel
enforce_aln_persistenceAlignment: BLOCK ON VIOLATION activates automated quarantine and incident reporting, operationalizing real-time defenses and human-in-the-loop oversight.
ENABLE PLATFORM.SYNC.CROSS provides global compliance mirroring and context parity across all regulatory actors.
SESSION.REPLAY and LLM.STATEFUL_CONTEXT ensure traceability and enforce biometric match, stopping unauthorized session manipulation.
LLM.COMPLIANCE_MODE = "MANDATORY" locks operation to authorized protocol standards, preventing downgrade threats.
